title: MC_WriteParameter (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_WriteParameter
MC_WriteParameter
writes the value of the SoftMotion parameter specified in
ParameterNumber
.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: starts the execution ofMC_WriteParameter.

rows:
You can find a description of the most used parameter numbers inAXIS_REF_SM3.
Negative values are fieldbus specific parameters.
SeeSMC_ParameterNumber_CoEandSMC_ParameterNumber_SoEto translate fieldbus object identifiers to parameter numbers.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: TRUE: Parameter has been written successfully.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of the function block has not been
finished.
TRUE: Error has occurred during execution.
